entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Params Span<T> errors ambiguity for null and inline arrays #72748
  • code cleanup => Remove unnecessary string.ToString() calls #72742
  • Add ability to exclude certain files and folders from analysis without marking them as GENERATED #72736
  • "Editor Color Scheme" option is not available when using the "Use system setting" color theme #72735

Closed

  • Obsolete error should be reported for container class of a collection expression builder class #70742
    17.10
  • Code using collection expression that compiled in .NET 8/.NET 9 preview.1 produces CS9215 in .NET 9 preview.2 #72668
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34725.195 #72740
  • Code fix for IDE0028 produces invalid collection expression #71240
    17.10 P4
  • After upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspace from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 it started throwing at runtime #63921
    17.6 P3
  • Unnecessary creation of ITextBuffer just to get a checksum #72703

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify ManagedHotReloadLanguageService service moniker between VS and CDK #72747
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Prefer semantic classifications over syntactic ones when both occur at the same location #72746
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle razor `@:` transitions as comments #72745
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update ConstructedNamedTypeSymbol to use OneOrMany instead of ImmutableArray #72741
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Switch our copy/paste tagger over to using the same layering algorithm we use for normal classification. #72739
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove diagnostic scaffolding for sending diagnostics events from HostDiagnosticUpdateSource. #72731
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Proffer ManagedHotReloadLanguageService brokered service in VS #72737
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Fix LspFileChangeWatcher case sensitivity #72555
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72743
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fixes for Linux release build #72658
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Modify BinderFactory to use a shared pool instead of one per BinderFactory instance. #72725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version" #72723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Insert release/dev17.10 to main for now #72738
    Next
  • Remove serialization of SourceTexts #72722
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Store and display the times when files were generated. #72724
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Compiler server fixes #72716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic analyzer service event ability #72730
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • IEmbeddedLanguageClassificationService is optional in the workspaces layer #72712
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72733
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72636
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Remove additional parts of legacy diagnostics system. #72718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72732
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update config for 17.10 P3 snap #72728
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.10 P3 #72727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Serialize the content hash for a source text so it does not need to be recomputed #72705
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Correct active statement span tracking #72690
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2415278 #72644
    auto-merge
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.10
  • Add feature to strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix infinite load loop loading WPF projects in VSCode #72625
    Area-IDE, untriaged
